hints.title: Multi-Layered Stability
hints.content:
237: :label: def-multilayer-stability
238: 
239: The Ricci Gas achieves stability through three nested mechanisms:
240: 
241: **Layer 1: Global Push-Pull Balance**
242: - **Aggregation**: Kinetic force $F = +\epsilon_R \nabla R$ pulls walkers together
243: - **Dispersion**: Cloning reward $\propto 1/R$ pushes walkers apart
244: - **Effect**: Prevents total collapse of swarm to a single point
245: 
246: **Layer 2: Internal Cluster Pressure**
247: - **Aggregation**: Same kinetic force tries to compress clusters
248: - **Dispersion**: Diversity signal $(d')^\beta$ decreases in dense clusters → reduces fitness
249: - **Effect**: Creates internal pressure preventing zero-variance collapse
250: 
251: **Layer 3: Singularity Regulation via Status Killing**
252: - **Mechanism**: Walkers die when $R > R_{\text{crit}}$
253: - **Effect**: Hard boundary prevents true mathematical singularity
254: - **Revival**: Dead walkers immediately revive via cloning from flat regions

237: :label: def-multilayer-stability

241: **Layer 1: Global Push-Pull Balance**
242: - **Aggregation**: Kinetic force $F = +\epsilon_R \nabla R$ pulls walkers together
243: - **Dispersion**: Cloning reward $\propto 1/R$ pushes walkers apart
244: - **Effect**: Prevents total collapse of swarm to a single point
245: 
246: **Layer 2: Internal Cluster Pressure**
247: - **Aggregation**: Same kinetic force tries to compress clusters
248: - **Dispersion**: Diversity signal $(d')^\beta$ decreases in dense clusters → reduces fitness
249: - **Effect**: Creates internal pressure preventing zero-variance collapse
250: 
251: **Layer 3: Singularity Regulation via Status Killing**
252: - **Mechanism**: Walkers die when $R > R_{\text{crit}}$
253: - **Effect**: Hard boundary prevents true mathematical singularity
254: - **Revival**: Dead walkers immediately revive via cloning from flat regions
